评论详情: This looks really nice, it's super soft, and is true to size. I was leery after seeing some of the reviews, but I love it. I got both the brown and the black and I wear a thick undershirt under it for winter. It'll be great for fall and spring without that also. Quality is good, don't hesitate.

This top is insanely soft and comfortable! I ordered my regular size large and it fit perfectly - not fitted but not oversized, just right. I have washed it twice and it looks great - no pills or fading. There were a few wrinkles (the top comes shrink-wrapped in plastic) but they weren't bad and came out after the second wash. This is well worth trying! I came back for two other colors after loving the first one I ordered. The fabric is a medium weight, perfect for winter and early spring.

The shirt is casual but with some detail which is nice. It fits well/as expected and is very soft and not too thin or heavy. The only drawback was the sleeves shrank up a touch. Not enough to return but enough I noticed and would have preferred the extra inch.
So comfortable, looks classy with trim. Can dress up easily. Hope it doesn’t shrink as it’s perfect fit right now. Great price too.

I never know what to expect from Amazon clothes but this was an amazing one! Super soft material inside and out. It didn’t pill after washing nor did it shrink. It’s cute, fits perfectly and is sooo cozy.

After reading mixed reviews- the positive and the negative- it can be a bit difficult to purchase an item not knowing what to expect.  I decided that if I didn’t like this top I could always donate it versus returning it. I ordered the XL because I’d rather have a top that  is too big rather than too small. I was pleasantly surprised when I received the top. It is so soft and lightweight and looks much nicer than a fleece lined sweat shirt.  I could’ve purchased a smaller size - but I’ve yet to wash this so I don’t know how much this will shrink -I will update this review after washing and drying this top. I love the black top accented with gray.  I’m very happy and comfy. The price is right and that’s also a big plus.

I usually wear a large in tops, bra size 38C. Height 5-6. 145 weight. I m short- waisted . I ordered a medium purple( burgundy) based on reviews. It fit perfect...arm length and length of top. even after washing.I love it. It is not too thick. If I was cold natured, I would get it to use as a heavenly pajama top.  But I wear mine under a coat and it did fine, in very cold weather.

I like it. The bottom band is a bit loose. I would have like it a little bit more if it hugged the hips a tiny bit more. This is a lightweight sweatshirt or heavy long sleeve T, can’t decide. But very comfy and soft and easy to wear around the house and walking the dog. Washed well. I’d buy it again.

I bought this for a christmas gift I made for a friend. It is SO soft and she loves it. It fits her just like her normal size. It looks great on her and the iron on letters worked great on the sleeve and back of the shirt where I put them. I might buy one for myself.

I wanted a light weight sweatshirt for home wear, and that is what I got. Length is mid hip, very soft material. I wear either misses M or L depending on the brand. This brand I definitely needed the large that I ordered. I haven't washed it yet, but appears to be made well . I will order another in a different color.
Fabric a little thin. Could not call this sweatshirt material. Wish it was
thank you widw kie ut

I am 5’2” and 160-165# and I ordered a large which was what was suggested based on previous orders.  The material is light, soft and comfortable.  It washed very well with no fading or shrinking.  Very nice for the money.

I’ve ordered several of these in different colors and expected the same however, this one is shorter in length and the material is so soft. I wish it was longer but I love the feel of the fabric! Color is true also.
These shirts are so soft, warm and comfortable!  I love them so much that I've bought 6!...so far.  I am 5 ft tall, 135lbs and buy Medium which are a little big but I like them like that.
I love these ,,the fit is perfect. The inside is a soft brushed finish and the colors are great. I have several in different colors and they all have  been washed and put in dryer. No shrinkage.

When I bought this shirt it was slightly large for me. I put it in the dryer and it shrunk just enough to fit me. I normally hang my shirts to air dry but I put this one in the dryer for a third time and now the sleeves are too short for me. I will not be able to put it in the dryer again or It will not fit. Also, It is wrinkle resistant and very warm to wear.
Nice dressy sweatshirt!  I just wanted something for the cold weather to go out for the day.  Looks great with a white turtleneck underneath.  definitely thinking of getting more colors
The shirt is very nice. The material is very soft. I wish it was baggier. True to size so if you want a baggie shirt you might want to go a size up.

Super comfortable, the material is so soft. It has survived several washings and I'm dont think that is going to change time soon. The material isn't too thick so it's not going to keep you super warm, but that's not what I was looking for anyway. I will definitely be buying more colors.
I ordered too large size. My mistake but I had to return it. Will try to order in new year again in correct size
This sweatshirt is polyester but very soft and warm. The outside but the inside is even softer. Fits true to size. I bought a large. Haven’t washed it yet but so far I love if

评论详情: I love the colors in this sweater and the fabric is VERY soft. However, the sizing is way too large, at least by one full size.

Very impressed with the look and feel of this fabric. Very soft and comfortable! I love it and will buy in different colors too . Am 5’1 and 108 lbs. ordered small and fits perfectly not over baggy and  also not tight .

I was so happy with product, as soon as I opened it I knew by the feeling of the material! It is so, soft and comfortable, a nice fit, I wear xl and that’s what I ordered it fit perfectly. The colors are nice too. I’m going to order another one and I highly recommend this product.

The dark green goes great with a pink accent. Keeps me warm in this early brutal Northeast winter that just arrived. I’m getting 2 more in different colors.  I only wish it came in petite as I’m only 5’1” tall. The Medium fit as expected. Don’t know how it holds up in the wash yet.
Nothing exciting here.  Soft and warm sweatshirt.

True to size.  5’2, 159 lbs and ordered a Medium- fit great.  The fabric is very soft and warm.  100% recommend!

I got a medium purple. It is true to size leaning on the bigger end of a medium. The color however looks more plum than it does purple. However there are so many variations. It is a super soft 90% polyester 10% spandex. It is very comfortable And like someone else said a nice change from the basic cotton sweatshirt. Not super heavy medium weight I’m thinking about exchanging for a different color. They will feel good this winter in Minnesota!
I think it is cute and I can wear it with several pants.

I decided to order this cute top, based on the favorable reviews. Received it yesterday and wearing it today- and I will be keeping an eye on future sales or coupons to order more in other colors! The fabric is so soft like fleece and very cozy- the fit is flattering, not too loose, not tight- just right! I imagine I will wash it inside out and maybe hang too dry to be on the safe side. I ordered the top in black with grey cuffs and collar, size small- I am 5‘4“, 130 lbs. I hope this review is helpful and convinces you to purchase this top as well. You won’t be disappointed!
Very comfortable and true to size. I bought another in black after wearing serveral times.

This is a nice medium weight sweatshirt. It is super comfy, luke wearing air, but warm. Ordering more colors. I think the fit it pretty true to size. I got the wine colored one and it is a very pretty color, matched the picture.
Love this shirt with jeans and leggings.  Thin but not too thin.

The product is fine. Using AI for color on the same model is problematic. In the picture the color looks to be a brighter purple. This item is burgundy. It’s still a good product and I’ll keep it. I don’t think the maker is the problem. I think using a composite model in the same pose and painting a color on the item is messing things up. I have been burned by this a lot and returned items to Amazon for this before. Points for softness.
